main

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Figure
      • main.Character
        • main.Ghost

  • public class Ghost
extends Character
    Ghost class.
    Ghost class extends the Character class.
    This class is used to manage the Ghost character in the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
    See Also:
    Character
